quotes.quote: You are not my friend. you are my brother, my friend.
They talk about my one taps and they think for me aiming is so easy.
sup, bitch?
Are those Red Bulls only for the commercials or can you actually drink them?
Push it like you push your girlfriend.
I'm a killer now, oh well.
Aim is about precision.
If we win more rounds than we lose, we win the game.
A win is a win, doesn’t matter how you win.
Do stupid stuff, but do it with confidence.
I don’t think I’m the best, I just don’t think there is anyone better.
What makes a great CS player is playing for the team rather than playing for yourself.
Don’t fool yourself into thinking you can only have one role in a team.
The more you lose, the less you win.
You’re a human being, it’s not normal to never lose.
If you are in a team and you have a problem, it means the whole team has a problem, and you should fix it together.
To be a good leader in cs or in life. You need to put people before yourself.
The best part is being able to play the game that you like.
A good captain should be knowledgable about the game and a person whom his team will follow and believe in.
Being emotional makes me even stronger.
To overcome the people that are hating.To overcome everybody doubting you.That is what drives me as a person.
If you can find fulfilment my only suggestion is, give in to that for as long as it’s feasible.
You can’t be the best player if you don’t have the best team in the world.
